name: Name
auth-attempts: You've attempted to sign in too many times. Please try again in $2 seconds.
auth-password-invalid-token: This password reset token is invalid.
auth-password-invalid-user: No user with that email address found.
auth-password-link-sent: Your password reset link has been sent.
auth-password-requirements: Passwords must be at least six characters and match the confirmation.
auth-required-reset-explain: An administrator has required you to reset your password before you can continue.
auth-validation-credentials: These credentials do not match our records.
auth-validation-token: You must have a password reset token
authorize-permissions-confirm-delete-mes: Are you sure you want to delete this permission?
authorize-permissions-flash-added-messag: The new permission has been created and can now be assigned to roles.
authorize-permissions-flash-deleted-mess: The permission has been deleted. The permission has been removed from all roles where it was assigned.
authorize-permissions-flash-updated-mess: The permission has been updated. Any role that has the permission has been updated as well.
authorize-roles-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
authorize-roles-flash-added-message: The new role has been created and can now be assigned to users.
authorize-roles-flash-deleted-message: The role has been deleted. Any users who were assigned the role will have it removed the next time they sign in.
authorize-roles-flash-updated-message: The role has been updated. Any users who are assigned the role will receive the updates the next time they sign in.
users-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users-confirm-restore-message: Are you sure you want to restore this user?
users-deleted-notice: Users with content associated with their account (characters, story entries, etc.) can be restored, but users without content associated with their account have been deleted from the system.
users-find: Find users by name or email
users-flash-added-message: The new user has been created and their password has been emailed to them.
users-flash-password-reset-message: The selected user(s) have had their password(s) reset. An email has been sent to notify them.
users-flash-restored-message: The user and some of their content have been restored. A new password has been generated and emailed to them.
users-gender: How do you prefer to be described?
users-gender-explain: Tell us which personal pronouns you prefer to use
users-nickname-explain: A nickname will be displayed instead of your full name.
users-validation-email-email: Please enter a valid email address
users-validation-email-unique: That email address is already in use
users-validation-password-min: Passwords must be at least 6 characters
users-profile-flash-password-updated-mes: Your password has been updated. Don't forget your password for the next time you sign in!
users-profile-validation-current-passwor: The password you entered doesn't match the password we have for you.
genre-depts-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this department? Positions assigned to this department will also be deleted.
genre-depts-flash-added-message: The department has been created. You can now add positions to this department.
genre-positions-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this position?
genre-positions-error-not-found-dept: No positions found for this department.
genre-positions-flash-added-message: The position has been created. You can now assign characters to this position.
genre-positions-flash-updated-message: All of the positions have been updated.
genre-positions-flash-validation-message: Positions could not be updated because of missing information. Please correct the issue(s) and try again.
genre-positions-start: Please select a department to view its positions.
genre-positions-unsaved: You have unsaved changes to your positions.
genre-ranks-build: Select some options to preview the new rank
genre-ranks-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this rank?
genre-ranks-error-not-found-group: No ranks found for this rank group.
genre-ranks-explain: Rank items are the actual ranks that bring together the group and info as well as being able to set the rank's background and overlay. This gives you the ultimate control when creating and managing your ranks.
genre-ranks-flash-added-message: The rank has been created. You can now assign users this rank.
genre-ranks-start: Please select a rank group to view its ranks.
genre-ranks-validation-group-exists: Please select a valid rank group
genre-ranks-validation-info-exists: Please select a valid rank info
genre-rank-groups-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this rank group? This will also remove all ranks associated with this group as well.
genre-rank-groups-confirm-duplicate-mess: Duplicating this rank group will also duplicate the ranks associated with the original group. Please select a new base image to use for the new ranks.
genre-rank-groups-explain: Rank groups allow you to quickly and easily group ranks together. If you want to create a whole new rank group, you can simply duplicate the group and all the ranks in the group will be duplicated as well.
genre-rank-groups-flash-added-message: The rank group has been created. You can now assign ranks to this group.
genre-rank-groups-flash-deleted-message: The rank group has been deleted.
genre-rank-groups-flash-duplicated-messa: The rank group has been duplicated. You can now assign ranks to this group.
genre-rank-groups-flash-updated-message: All of the rank groups have been updated.
genre-rank-groups-flash-validation-messa: Rank groups could not be updated because of missing information. Please correct the issue(s) and try again.
genre-rank-groups-unsaved: You have unsaved changes to your rank groups.
genre-rank-info-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this rank info? This will also remove all ranks associated with this info as well.
genre-rank-info-explain: Rank info records allow you to re-use much of the basic information about a rank (its name, short name, etc.). When you need to change a rank name, you'll just change it once and all your ranks will be updated.
genre-rank-info-flash-added-message: The rank info has been created. You can now assign this info to ranks.
genre-rank-info-flash-deleted-message: The rank info has been deleted.
genre-rank-info-flash-updated-message: All of the rank info has been updated.
genre-rank-info-flash-validation-message: Rank info could not be updated because of missing information. Please correct the issue(s) and try again.
genre-rank-info-unsaved: You have unsaved changes to your rank info.
genre-rank-info-validation-required-shor: Please enter a rank short name
characters-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
characters-confirm-restore-message: Are you sure you want to restore this character?
characters-deleted-notice: Characters with content associated with their account (users, story entries, etc.) can be restored, but characters without associated content have been deleted from the system.
characters-flash-added-message: The new character has been created and images can now be added to the character bio.
characters-flash-restored-message: The character and some of their content have been restored.
media-confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this media?
media-flash-primary-image-updated-messag: The primary image has been updated.
media-flash-saved-message: Your file has been saved and uploaded.
error-unauthorized-explain: You do not have permission to take this action.
validation-email-valid: Please enter a valid email address
validation-password-min: Passwords must be at least 6 characters
